name: Thief&Police
description:
A two-player chase game, for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

You'll need one player to act as a thief and another to act as a police. If the police catch the thief in the 120s, the police win. Otherwise, the thief will win the game.

Stop the dice to determine your step count, and obviously, there will be some traps and tricks on the map. Use them, to win the game!

Thief: use A&D to control the direction, and use the space bar to stop the dice.

Police: use ←&→ to control the direction, and use the enter key to stop the dice.
